metadata.Title: CVE-2023-46445 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue in AsyncSSH v2.14.0 and earlier allows attackers to control the extension info message (RFC 8308) via a man-in-the-middle attack.

criterions.comment: python-asyncssh: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
